description.value:
If the barbarian kills an intelligent creature with a CR equal to at least half her character level while raging, she heals 5 hit points. If she is already at her maximum number of hit points, she instead gains 5 temporary hit points, which donâ€™t stack if she kills multiple creatures.

A barbarian must be at least 10th level and have the lesser daemon totem and daemon totem rage powers to select this rage power.
